runs.comm: Shehzad is away, bounces from short of a good length outside off, he slashes, and gets it high over the lone slip for a boundary
147 kph delivery that zips in off the seam, boy this lad has some pace, Ahmed was in no shape to play at it and was hit high on the pads
touch shorter this time, allows him to rock back and push it wide of point where Jesse dives to his left to prevent the single
145 kph back of a length ball that moves away a touch off the seam, he pushes at it from the crease and is beaten
another one back of a length, but outside off this time, and he can shoulder arms
slapped away to the right of point off the front foot, it was full and he went for the shot, Ryder with another good effort in the field saves the certain boundary
gets some shape away from the right-hander right away, he looked to drive it from the crease, and was nowhere near the line of the ball as it seamed away
a tad shorter and wider outside off, allowing Ahmed to leave it alone, good carry in this pitch
looks to cut this back of a length ball, but it was not wide enough for the shot, and he bottom edges it into the off side

no need to get  to the pitch of the ball of you can hit it like that, it was pitched fuller, moved away a tad around off, but Shehzad had it covered, and moved his front leg aside and tonked it straight past Mills for a boundary, and it fairly flew off the blade
better line and length, tucks him for room, and he plays it back to the bowler

Mills bowls it full and on the pads, Shehzad does not need any more invitation, and lifts it over midwicket, Guptill running in from the boundary puts in the dive but it eludes him to go for a boundary
151 kph almost-yorker length delivery which Hafeez digs out towards mid on, applause as Milne breaches the 150 mark
150 kph back of a length ball that comes in from wide outside off, bounces high as Shehzad misses out on the upper cut, more applause as he continues to hit 150
shot! Shehzad was waiting for the short delivery, didn't get up much and Shehzad rocked back to pull it past midwicket for a boundary
another one, Milne goes for another short ball into the body, Shehzad was already in position for the pull shot, and lifted it well over midwicket off the back foot

he goes fuller, it makes no difference to Shehzad, he is eyeing the midwicket boundary here, moves the front leg out of the way, and swings it just over midwicket for the third boundary in three balls
he moves the line outside off stump, Shehzad gets right to the pitch this time, and pings the gap between cover and point, Guptill gives chase and pulls it back in
Hafeez in to the act now, gets a back of a length ball on leg stump, goes on the back foot and tucks it past short fine leg for a boundary

they take on Nathan McCullum with a tap in front of extra cover, Shehzad puts in the full length dive at the striker's end, and replays show that he has just managed to beat Nathan's throw, excellent running
makes room outside leg stump, Mills follows him there, the inside edge scoots past square leg as he looks to go off side
tries the tap and run in front of extra cover again, but Nathan is quick to get to the ball, and Hafeez has to rush back in side the crease
gets a full delivery, drives off the front foot but finds Nathan in the way at short extra cover
good end to the over from Mills, gives him no room outside off to free his arms, he can only push it out to backward point
and is greeted with a caress off a full delivery that beats the off side cordon, and runs all the way along the ground into the boundary, that was some timing
eyes the midwicket boundary again, and gets the swing right of the middle of the bat as Southee drops it just a tad short, this is brilliant hitting
Southee tries the slow off cutter, he gets the front leg out of the way, and lifts him over extra cover for the third boundary of the over
goes over midwicket again, he is on fire here, but there is a man in place on the deep midwicket boundary now
no violence this time, but another boundary, Hafeez gets forward and opens the face of the blade to get the placement perfect past short third man and backward point
better delivery, moves in on leg stump after pitching around off on a length, he gets forward and flicks it straight to short fine leg
yorker length ball on the stumps, New Zealand need more of these, he makes room and hits it down towards long on for a single
Mills drops it down the leg side, and Hafeez waits for it to come on and lifts it over square leg for a boundary
another one, this time straight down the ground, it was not exactly a half volley, but Hafeez went through with the shot anyway and got it straight over Mills' head
innovation from Hafees,it was a good delivery from Mills, length ball on middle, he got down on a knee, got outside the line, and scooped it high over short fine leg's head, three in three again
good delivery, yorker around leg stump, he was backing away down the leg side, but there was no room to work with in the end
Mills gets away with a wide and full ball outside off, he comes forward and drives it to extra cover who is right on the edge of the circle
flicks this length ball past the vacant midwicket region, there are two men in the deep there, widish long on and deep midwicket
waits for this length ball to come on outside off, and steers it late to squarish third man
slower one from Southee, driven down to long on
the first six of the match now, it was a length ball on middle, and he went over deep midwicket with the full-blooded swing, just bent his knees and swung it cleanly
pulled away to deep square leg where a diving stop prevents the boundary
worked away off the front foot to deep midwicket for a single
goes down on a knee and drives backward of point
flat from round the wicket, played back to the bowler
102 kph going across the batsman flat and quick, off the thick outside edge to short third man
squeezes out this full ball to squarish short third man
tapped into the off side, Nathan runs to field, and the single is on
goes for the reverse sweep now to a full delivery angled across him, is hit on the pads, but too far outside the line of off, and the appeal is rightly turned down
starts off with a length ball coming in with the angle, hit down towards long off
gets forward to a length delivery close to off stump, and pushes it out with an open bat face to backward point
looks to swing at this one, but Franklin bowls it slower at 114 kph, and he can only push it out to extra cover

Rosco times his leap at extra cover to perfection, it was full and wide and Hafeez went to lift it over the infield, but did not get enough elevation, Taylor was on the edge of the circle and got the timing on the leap absolutely right to take the ball high over his head, New Zealand have some respite finally
gets right forward and defends this length ball outside off stump towards extra cover
arrests the front foot movement and tucks this one off the pads backward of square to get off the mark
Nathan dives to his right as the ball is pushed back at him to prevent the single
strays down the pads from round the stumps, nudged fine down the leg side
tosses this one slowly through the air across the batsman, who gets forward and gets an outside edge that runs past the keeper
played back to the bowler
Shehzad gets to his 50 with a glide past point for  a single, raises his bat to acknowledge the applause, well played
flat and quick, pushed back to Nathan, end of a good over
full and angled across the batsman, Shehzad it is who guides it past backward point and short third man for a boundary

he goes this time! Franklin bowls the slower one angled into the batsman from round the stumps, and Shehzad was eyeing the midwicket boundary again, but missed out with the swing this time as he went down on one knee, was hit in front of the stumps, umpire thought that was enough to send him back, and Franklin has pulled things back for his side here

almost another one! there was some confusion as Younis played this to extra cover and set off for a single, Taylor rushed to field it and targetted the stumps, but Younis was home with the full length dive
pushed towards long off
tucked away to fine leg

almost carried to midwicket, it was a full toss and Younis hit it in the air to the diving man there, but it dropped just short of him, he had the presence of mind to throw  the ball at the non-striker's stumps even as he fell, excellent stuff
almost yorker length on the stumps, dug out back to the bowler
length ball on the pads, whipped away backward of square leg
flicks this fullish one wristily over midwicket for a single
gets bat in front of pad to flick this one on middle and leg down to fine leg
the off cutter on the stumps, he goes back in the crease, has no room to work with and pushes it backward of point for a single
fuller and driven straight back to Styris, good over from the veteran
hit forcefully down to long on
gentle stuff from James on off stump, he goes back in the crease to guide it to point for another single
Ross has been too good in the field today, this one was driven off the front foot, but he dived to his right at short extra cover to save some runs
takes it on the full around off and pings long off with the drive
yes, no, yes, no, yes, pushed out in front of Ross and they are initially hesitant to take him on, but go through for the single in the end

this was on the cards, Younis fended this one in the air in front of midwicket and set off merrily for the run, Shafiq sent him back rightly, but he was in no position to get back in time, even though he put in the dive he was caught well short of the crease by the throw from Nathan, once again, Pakistan have lost momentum after a bright start
looks to sweep from way outside off, and is beaten
comes down the pitch and whips this flat delivery to deep square leg
down the pitch comes Umar, and lofts it inside out wide of long off for a boundary, shouts of catch it but it was placed too well
hit away through point off the back foot

another one goes! Shafiq this time, haring down the track, got to the pitch of the flighted ball, but could not get enough distance on the shot, the man at long off placed himself perfectly close to the ropes to take the catch, Nathan smiles, Pakistan flounder
rocks back and looks to pull this one, but it is not short enough, is quicker too and it rolls away through square leg
and Umar has lifted him over deep midwicket for six, it was in the slot, fullish and on the stumps, he was set up for the shot and swing it cleanly over the boundary
slower ball, 116 kph, huge change in pace for someone bowling 150 kph, he misses out predictably outside off stump
sprays it too far wide outside off stump
149 kph steepler outside off stump, it bounced high and Shahid tried to upper cut it, but missed out
now sprays it down the leg side, and McGlashan saves some runs with a good diving take
slow bouncer this time, 13 kph, he goes down underneath it, he is showing the full range in this over
tapped in front  of cover for a single off the back foot
tries the inside-out Federer forehand to a back of a length ball that seams away and bounces outside off stump, does not get the timing on the shot as it rolls away to extra cover
gets one in his zone on the stumps, and slogs it in the gap between deep midwicket and long on for a boundary
adjust the length this time, and he hits it towards extra cover
driven down to long on for a single
yorker length ball, good variation, dug out to long on
gets forward and pushes this flatter ball to deep midwicket
Afridi goes down on a knee, and slog sweeps this fullish delivery high in the air in to the stands past deep midwicket, no catching them when Shahid hits them cleanly
gets away with a full toss on middle and leg, worked away through midwicket
another full toss, lower this time, makes room and hits it away to deep midwicket
Southee continues to get away with the full tosses, this one was down the leg side, and Umar helped it on its way but could beat the man at squarish fine leg
121 kph slower one now, shorter too, Umar backs away and throws the bat at it, McGlashan takes it on the bounce as he misses
good delivery, almost yorker length, flicked away to midwicket

Shahid falls going for the pick up shot over fine leg, it was another full toss from Southee, he walked across too far outside off stump, and swung across the line, missed, and the ball crashed into middle stump
throws his bat at a full and wide one outside off, and gets it between backward point and short third man for a welcome boundary
launches into the pull shot, but hits it straight to deep midwicket
back of a length just around off stump, he tries to ride the bounce, but it comes off the bottom half of the bat and rolls away in to the off side close to the wickets
misses out on another full toss, they are working well for New Zealand here, mistimed hit, away to square leg
Razaq goes back and slaps this one in front of cover, Brownlie running in plucks it close to the ropes on the bounce with one hand, what a stop
cut away backward of point for a single
Akmal gets it away fine, goes down on one knee and plays the lap shot efficiently for a boundary, takes it one the full as he does that
another low full toss, hit down to the right of long off for a single, almost took out Southee as he swung hard at it
dropped Razzaq got the top edge as he lined up for the straight swing down the ground, Nathan running in from deep midwicket had it under control, but dropped it in the end as he dived forward
no catching or dropping this one, Razzaq gets one in his slot, length ball outside off and murders it high over wide long on for a biggie
good slower one outside off, Razzaq is taken by surprise and cannot do anything with it
crack! how does he do it? he just backs away to a back of a length ball, and smokes it flat over midwicket for a six
looks for the big swing over extra cover off a fuller ball, but the bat rolls in his hands and the outside edge loops in the air for sweeper cover to take a dolly close to the ropes
Rafa would have been proud of this tennis forehand from razzaq, it was shortish and sitting up outside off and he creamed it wide of long off for a boundary
another one, this one goes all the way, shortish and Razzaq makes room outside leg stump, and hammers it over extra cover off the back foot

better length from Milne, but the line is in Razzaq's zone, he has picked his spot here, extra cover it is, Taylor in the circle has no chance as the drive flew past him and rocketed into the boundary

and one more, this time he didn't time the golf swing alright, but got it to the left of long on, where Guptill ran hard, dived and picked it up, but then it slipped from his grasp to trickle in to the boundary
bowls the slower one on target, just outside leg as he backs away, but cannot connect this time, they go through for the bye even as McGlashan misses at the striker's end with the under-arm throw
